comment.author: 37110657@N02
comment._content: Any rough idea as to when this was taken?

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks, “Critical Observer,” for your interest in Florida Memory on the Commons. Other images from this photographer, Sherrill Jameson, included in the Florida Photographic Collection of the State Library and Archives of Florida date from the early to mid-1980s. This image is likely from a little later. The date in the historical record has been changed to ca. 1990 to reflect this.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 37110657@N02
comment._content:
Thanks for the prompt reply and for sharing these photos here.

Florida holds special nostalgic significance for me.
